fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.evaluation

Class MulticlassAccuracyEvaluator<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.evaluation.MulticlassAccuracyEvaluator<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Evaluator<T>

    public class MulticlassAccuracyEvaluator<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Evaluator<T>
    Evaluation class for computing the multiclass accuracy on a testing set, given a provided cmulticlass classifier.
    Author:
    picard
